body:
Hey, so I recently made an appeal but it was denied. So since I don't really have time or MC anymore I have decided to quit some reasons are personal other are drama and school related. I know I made an apology post before but I came back and spat in a mods face (you know who you are). I would like to say sorry to everyone for What I have done to you and I hope you forgive me. 


I will be on the forums once a day if I get the chance. I don't think I'm gonna appeal again but if I do I will do it in 7months to a year.


Minecraft and Avicus have been a great experience I have grown since I first played minecraft as a person and a player.


Here are some people who helped me along the way.

MLGPorky: you were like on of my best friends I could remember that video (Gladiator) were you targeted me xD I wish you luck in school and your channel.

Vlad: I love you and your channel (no homo)
Especially your soccer videos.

Mango: Your a great admin and a great person. I know you will do a great job helping avicus grow. I remember when I played with you on your build server cya m8.

Staff Team: I know most of us got off on the wrong foot and I realized that now but I'd like to say I'm sorry and Thanks.

Avicus Community: this server probably has one of the best community's even if it is full of salt sometimes but anyone who joins is most likely to stay for a very long time. 


Good Luck Avicus :D

title: True Apolagy/Quiting Minecraft

replies.body: good bye :( and I hope your life gets better  without drama
replies.body_tagged: good bye :( and I hope your life gets better  without drama

See ya sheepy
